entries.abort: That's it? You mean we're stuck here? Thanks for nothing!
entries.arrived_at_loc: The civilian transport should be nearby. Escort it to Kashyyyk space station safely.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 Hostile starship signatures detected.
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 Hostile forces eliminated.
entries.autorewardbody: You've done a great service for these civilians! I don't know how they ran afoul of the Gotal bandits... but you can be sure they're updating their navigation software right away. Thanks again!
entries.complete: Great! The civilians are safe and sound on their way to their homes. Good job.
entries.escort_too_far1: Where did you go? Come back!
entries.failed_destroy: What a horrible tragedy! All of those poor civilians were killed...
entries.failed_protect: We lost contact with the civilian transport! You should have stayed closer to it!
entries.found_loc: I've got the location for the civilian distress call. Fly to this waypoint and rescue them!
entries.goodbye_1: Thank the maker! Great job, my friend! We're off...
entries.goodbye_2: Thank the maker! Great job, my friend! We're off...
entries.goodbye_3: Thank the maker! Great job, my friend! We're off...
entries.goodbye_4: Thank the maker! Great job, my friend! We're off...
entries.goodbye_5: Thank the maker! Great job, my friend! We're off...
entries.hull_half: I know you're busy but... our hull integrity at fifty percent...
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow closely and protect this civilian transport from incoming hostiles.
entries.quest_location_d: The civilian transport is drifting somewhere near the Gotal bandits stronghold.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The pilot of this civilian transport is trying to escape bloodthirsty bandits!
entries.reason_1: Gotal Bandits jumped us just outside the system. Now, our navicomputer is fried! Can you help us get out of here?
entries.reason_2: Gotal Bandits jumped us just outside the system. Now, our navicomputer is fried! Can you help us get out of here?
entries.reason_3: Gotal Bandits jumped us just outside the system. Now, our navicomputer is fried! Can you help us get out of here?
entries.reason_4: Gotal Bandits jumped us just outside the system. Now, our navicomputer is fried! Can you help us get out of here?
entries.reason_5: Gotal Bandits jumped us just outside the system. Now, our navicomputer is fried! Can you help us get out of here?
entries.taunt_3: Step aside! This is our take!
entries.title: Escort a Civilian Transport out of the Kashyyyk system.
entries.title_d: The Kashyyyk space station has received a distress call from a civilian transport that was damaged by Gotal bandits. The bandits used some sort of unknown device to knock out their navigation system.
